afghanistan.notes:
Visitors born in Afghanistan do not require a visa.
Visitors arriving via military air need to legalize their stay if they wish to leave via commercial airline.
All visitors are fingerprinted.

algeria.notes: Persons may be denied entry if entering with a passport containing visas or stamps issued by Israel.

angola.notes:
Visitors who have been granted an online pre-visa are then issued with a visa on arrival at Luanda International Airport.
For a maximum total stay of 90 days within a one year period.

antigua_and_barbuda.notes: Stringent application of rules regarding proof of sufficient funds, return ticket and accommodation.

argentina.notes:
Extendable up to 180 days.
Visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry.

australia.notes:
90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted
May enter using SmartGate.

austria.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

azerbaijan.notes:
If intending to stay in the Republic of Azerbaijan for more than ten days, the visitor must register at the State Migration Service of the Republic of Azerbaijan within three days upon arrival in Azerbaijan.
Applicants of Armenian ancestry or with Armenian visas in their passport may not obtain a visa.
Can obtain a 30 days visa on arrival only if arriving on a direct flight of Azerbaijan Airlines from New York City.

bahamas.notes: Passport Card or Enhanced Drivers License valid for Sea Travel

bangladesh.notes:
Available at Shahjalal International Airport, Shah Amanat International Airport and Osmani International Airport.
Visa is not required by Bangladeshi Americans.
Departure tax applies.

belarus.notes:
Must arrive and depart via Minsk International Airport.
Registration upon arrival for stays longer than 5 days is mandatory.
Visa-free visits to Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park for up to 3 days.
Visa-free visits to the Grodno and Augustow Canal visa-free zone for up to 5 days.
No transit without a visa under any circumstance.

belgium.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

belize.notes:
Extendable up to 6 months
Departure tax applies.

bhutan.notes:
$250 per day is a non-negotiable minimum daily tariff paid by all visitors to Bhutan.
Visas are issued only to tourists booked with a local licensed tour operator.

bolivia.notes: Reciprocal fee applies. Visas are issued with 10 year validity.

bosnia_and_herzegovina.notes:
90 days within any 6-month period
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.

brazil.notes: 90 days per year; valid for 2 years.

cambodia.notes:
Visa is also obtainable online.
All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure.

cameroon.notes: International Certificate of Vaccination and current immunization records required.

canada.notes:
Anyone with a criminal record (including misdemeanors or alcohol-related driving offenses in the US) may not be able to enter Canada without first obtaining an approval for rehabilitation or a Temporary Resident Permit (TRP).
Passport Card, NEXUS card, or Enhanced Drivers License valid for Land and Sea Travel

cape_verde.notes:
Obtainable at Nelson Mandela International Airport, Cesária Évora Airport, Amílcar Cabral International Airport and Aristides Pereira International Airport.
Passengers arriving via Africa must hold an International Certificate of Vaccination.

chad.notes:
International Certificate of Vaccination required.
Registration within 72 hours is mandatory prior to arrival. Registration is good for the life of the passport.

china.notes:
Registration mandatory within 24 hours of arrival;
All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure between the ages of 14 and 70.
72-hour visit without a visa when in transit at Changsha, Chengdu, Chongqing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Harbin, Kunming, Qingdao, Wuhan, Xi'an and Xiamen.144-hours visit without a visa when in transit through Beijing Capital International Airport, Dalian, Hangzhou, Shijiazhuang Zhengding International Airport in Hebei, Nanjing, Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport and Shanghai Pudong International Airport, Shanghai Railway Station and the Port of Shanghai); Shenyang and Tianjin Binhai International Airport
Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan do count as third countries under the 72 and 144-hours visa-free visit transit policy.
Visas for U.S. citizens are valid for up to 10 years.

colombia.notes:
Extendable up to 180-days stay within a one-year period
Colombian-born U.S. citizens and U.S. citizens traveling with children may face special exit requirements.

democratic_republic_of_the_congo.notes:
International Certificate of Vaccination required.
Registration required.
Visas must be issued at the DR Congo embassy in Washington, D.C.

republic_of_the_congo.notes:
International Certificate of Vaccination required.
A letter of invitation or written proof of a hotel reservation required.

côte_d'ivoire.notes:
eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport
International Certificate of Vaccination required

croatia.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.

cuba.notes: Tourist travel was historically prohibited under U.S. law for U.S. citizens, permanent residents, and others subject to U.S. jurisdiction. Under the Cuban Assets Control Regulations, all persons subject to U.S. jurisdiction are not permitted to travel to Cuba, and must be licensed in order to engage in any travel-related transactions pursuant to travel to, from, and within Cuba. In July 2015, the United States resumed diplomatic relations with Cuba. Discussions on lifting the travel ban have initiated. On June 16, 2017, U.S. President Donald Trump announced new travel restrictions.

czech_republic.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

denmark.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area
US citizens can enter Denmark for up to 90 days every six months, regardless of whether they have stayed in another Schengen area (except the other Nordic countries) country prior to entry into Denmark.

dominican_republic.notes:
Extendable up to 90 days
Passport Card or Enhanced Drivers License valid for Sea Travel

ecuador.notes: Extendable for another 90 days, per year

equatorial_guinea.notes: International Certificate of Vaccination required if you are traveling from a country with risk of yellow fever.

estonia.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

ethiopia.notes:
Obtainable at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport.
Visitors are fingerprinted

finland.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

france.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area (in Regions of France)

gabon.notes:
Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

georgia.notes: Visitors must hold proof of health insurance.

germany.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

greece.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

guatemala.notes: An exit tax must be paid when departing by air.

guinea.notes:
Single entry valid for 3 months.
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

guinea-bissau.notes: Visitors must apply for a visa on arrival in advance or online.

hungary.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

iceland.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

india.notes:
e-Visa holders must arrive via 25 designated airports[Note 2] or 3 designated seaports.[Note 3]
An Indian e-Tourist Visa can only be obtained twice in one calendar year.
$75 fee along with bank surcharge of 2.5%
Confirmation has to be shown at the border where a visa on arrival is issued.
Visitors are fingerprinted.
American citizens are eligible for a ten-year, multiple-entry tourist visa.

iran.notes:
Iranian visas must be obtained from the Special Interests section of the Embassy of Pakistan, Washington, D.C.
US visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry.
Independent travelers must be accompanied by an authorized guide at all times.

iraq.notes:
Some U.S. citizens must obtain an exit stamp at a Residency Office before departing the country.
Some visitors who plan to stay for more than 10 days must also obtain a residency stamp.
Visitors who come as part of a government-sponsored tour, upon presentation of proper paperwork from the government, may receive a visa on arrival at Baghdad International Airport for $80 + 1250 Iraqi dinar. Visitors are not required to obtain any other permits, including for Iraqi Kurdistan, or submit blood tests.

ireland.notes: Strict application of immigration rules regarding providing proof of the trip purpose, sufficient funds, return ticket and accommodation.

israel.notes:
Dual nationals of Israel and the United States who don't have an Israeli passport, including infants, may be required to obtain an Israeli passport in order to leave Israel.
Entry prohibited for any person “who knowingly issues a public call for boycotting Israel".

italy.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

jamaica.notes: There is a departure tax for travelers, which is regularly included in airfare.

jordan.notes:
Visa on arrival obtainable at most international ports of entry and at most international land border crossings (except King Hussein/Allenby Bridge crossing).
Iris scan is taken on arrival and departure

kazakhstan.notes: As part of the no-visa pilot program in period 15 July 2014 – 15 July 2015. In June 2015 this program was extended until December 31, 2017.

kenya.notes:
International Certificate of Vaccination is recommended.
All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure

north_korea.notes: U.S. passports holders must obtain a special passport validation from the U.S. federal government before travel.

laos.notes:
Conditions apply.
Available at international airports Luangphabang, Pakse, Savannakhet and Vientiane, and at 4 land borders Friendship Bridge,[Note 4] and at 13 border crossings[Note 5] as well as Tanalaeng train station in Vientiane, which connects to the train station in Nongkai, Thailand.
Entry points Lalai, Lantui, Meuang mom, Pakxan, and Phoudou are open only to visa holders.
Extendable up to 60 days.

latvia.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

lebanon.notes:
Extendable for 2 additional months.
Granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket

libya.notes:
Visitors travelling to Libya for touristic purposes are required to convert USD 1,000 or equivalent on arrival.
Holders of passports bearing an Israeli visa or entry/exit stamps from Israel are not allowed to enter Libya.

liechtenstein.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

lithuania.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area
Mandatory medical insurance.

luxembourg.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

macedonia.notes: Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

madagascar.notes:
Available at all airports servicing international flights.
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge. Visas for 60 or 90 days available for a fee.

malawi.notes: From 1 October 2015 visitors are generally advised to obtain a visa in advance.

malaysia.notes:
All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure.
Immigration offenses, such as visa overstaying, are punishable by caning.

maldives.notes:
Extendable up to 90 days.
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

mali.notes:
Letter of invitation required.
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

malta.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

marshall_islands.notes:
Departure fee applies.
U.S. citizens may live and work freely in the Marshall Islands under the Compact of Free Association.

mauritania.notes:
Available at Nouakchott–Oumtounsy International Airport.
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

mexico.notes:
Visitors entering by land and traveling farther than 20 kilometers into Mexico or staying longer than 72 hours must obtain a document Forma Migratoria Multiple.
Passport Card or Enhanced Drivers License valid for Land and Sea Travel

micronesia.notes:
All states except Yap have a departure fee.
U.S. citizens may live and work freely in Micronesia under the Compact of Free Association.
There is no limit to the length of time U.S. citizens can remain in the FSM.

moldova.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period
Registration upon arrival is mandatory.

montenegro.notes: Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.

myanmar.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports or from three land border crossings: Tachileik, Myawaddy, and Kawthaung

nauru.notes: Visas are issued with validity of 30 days.

nepal.notes:
Obtainable at Tribhuvan International Airport and certain land borders.
Total of no more than 150 aggregate days in any given calendar year.

netherlands.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area (European Netherlands)

nicaragua.notes: A tourist card must be purchased upon arrival.

norway.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

oman.notes:
Extendable for 30 days
Holders of a visa or entrance stamp of the Emirate of Dubai that is valid for at least 21 days are visa exempt.
Holders of a visa for Qatar that is valid for travel to Oman and valid for at least one month are visa exempt when arriving directly from Qatar.
Iris scan is taken on arrival

pakistan.notes:
Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.
Visa on arrival when travelling as part of a group through a designated tour operator.

palau.notes: U.S. citizens may live and work freely in Palau under the Compact of Free Association.

panama.notes: Denial of entry or transit to any person who has a criminal conviction.

papua_new_guinea.notes:
Extendable for 30 days
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

paraguay.notes: U.S. citizens arriving by air may obtain a visa on arrival at Silvio Pettirossi International Airport in Asuncion. This is a multiple entry visa with a validity of up to 10 (ten) years. If entering elsewhere, a visa must be obtained in advance from the embassy or consulate.

philippines.notes: Naturalized US citizens of former Philippine nationality (balikbayan) allowed to stay for one year.

poland.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area
Dual nationals must use their Polish passport

portugal.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

qatar.notes:
Available only at Hamad International Airport. For other ports of entry, a Free visa as of 20 Oct 2017 that could change and can be extended for 1 month.
Holders of a valid common visa issued by Oman are exempt from a visa if arriving from Oman directly.

russia.notes:
72-hour visa-free for international cruise ship/ferry passengers only if travelling with an organized tour and accompanied at all times by a tour operator.
Registration required after 7 business days.
American citizens may receive multiple entry visas valid for three years.

rwanda.notes:
Visitors are fingerprinted
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

samoa.notes:
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
Departure tax applies.

saudi_arabia.notes:
Holders of passports that contain visas or entry/exit stamps for Israel will likely be refused entry.
Advance visa is required.
No tourist visas available.
All visitors are fingerprinted

seychelles.notes:
Extendable up to a year
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

singapore.notes: All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure

slovakia.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area
Medical insurance required.
Sufficient funds of $50 per person per day required.
Registration within 3 working days required.

slovenia.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area
Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory.

solomon_islands.notes:
3 months within 12 months
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

somalia.notes:
Available at Berbera, Borama, Burao, Erigavo and Hargeisa airports.
30 days, available at Bosaso Airport, Galcaio Airport and Mogadishu Airport.

south_africa.notes: Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry.

spain.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

sudan.notes:
Holders of passports that contain visas or entry/exit stamps for Israel will likely be refused entry.
Exit visa required.
Registration within 3 days mandatory.

suriname.notes: Obtainable at Johan Adolf Pengel International Airport.

sweden.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

switzerland.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period in the Schengen Area

syria.notes:
Registration required within 15 days.
Departure tax applies at all borders.
Persons with passports bearing Israeli visas or entry/exit stamps are not allowed to enter.

tajikistan.notes:
If arriving from a country that has a Tajik diplomatic mission a visa should be obtained in advance.
eVisa holders can enter through all border points.

tanzania.notes: Ordinary visa available on arrival for $100

thailand.notes: Maximum two visits annually if not arriving by air.

tonga.notes: Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

turkmenistan.notes:
Departure fee applies.
10-day visa on arrival if holding letter of invitation issued by a company registered in Turkmenistan with a prior approval from the Foreign Ministry.

tuvalu.notes:
Extendable up to 3 months
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.

uganda.notes:
Determined at the port of entry.
Must apply online at least 2 business days or more prior to travel. As of March 2017, airlines were refusing passengers permission to board flights to Uganda if they did not have a print-out of the document showing that they had successfully applied for an eVisa. Ugandan immigration authorities also may require additional documentation, including proof of a return plane ticket and detailed tour itinerary in Uganda.
International Certificate of Vaccination required.

united_arab_emirates.notes:
Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
Iris scan taken on arrival

uzbekistan.notes:
5-day visa free transit when in transit at the international airports on condition of holding a confirmed onward ticket for a flight to a third country.
Registration within 3 days is mandatory.

vietnam.notes:
A single entry eVisa is available.
Phú Quốc visa exemption for up to 30 days.

yemen.notes:
Registration mandatory.
Exit visa required for stays over 30 days.

zambia.notes:
Exact period determined on arrival, later extendable free of charge.
All visitors are fingerprinted.
Two blank pages required
International Certificate of Vaccination required.
Electronic visa also available.

zimbabwe.notes:
Tourism purposes only.
Electronic visa also available.
